items.sentence: From the top of that tall building, you can easily see the city.
Live each day as if it were your last. Someday, you'll be right.
It doesn't matter all that much what college you graduated from.
All Mary's friends warned her that Tom was only after her money.
Tom found a bottle with a note inside it washed up on the beach.
After months of fighting, Tom and Mary decided to call it quits.
Tom doesn't know the difference between a fable and a fairytale.
The language course Tom designed is more confusing than helpful.
Tom was the only one who seemed to notice that Mary was missing.
Even a clock that is stopped shows the correct time twice a day.
